master p: but man i done been through it all so i i said i wanna tell my story. cause i never cried or nothing and thats where the make em say uhh uhh thats like my pain. thats basically what it is. thats my battle cry. think about it. none of us are perfect. we live in an imperfect world you know only god can judge me thats how i look at it. the people thats sitting around pointing their fingers imagine all the stuff theyre probably doing. whether youre police officers doctors lawyers presidents whatever you got good and bad in everything. you know were putting people on a pedestal thats just a human like us. you know i mean they got more drugs in the rich neighborhoods than they got in the hood. a lot of their kids dying from overdose and things like that think about it. black kids have to figure it out we dont have rehabs to go to. you gotta rehab yourself. but for us you cant pull the plug on us and tell us its over. not me
